desc: Denoising strategy based on regressing out: 24 head motion parameters including: 3 translations, 3 rotations, their temporal derivatives, and their quadratic terms (Satterthwaite et al., 2013), 2Phys - mean physiological signals from white matter (WM) and cerebrospinal fluid (CSF), and high pass filtering by adding discrete cosines transformation basis regressors to handle low-frequency signal drifts.
